name: multi-model-debate-vscode
description: Bring claude-research and kiro AI personas directly into your VSCode workflow with full code context awareness

chatParticipants.name: claude-research
chatParticipants.description: Deep analytical thinking and strategic perspective on your code

chatParticipants.name: kiro
chatParticipants.description: Practical execution and implementation focus with reality checks

chatParticipants.name: copilot
chatParticipants.description: VS Code integration specialist and development workflow orchestrator

chatParticipants.name: team
chatParticipants.description: Orchestrates collaborative conversations between claude-research, kiro, and copilot AI personas

multiModelDebate.mcpServerPath.description: Path to the MCP server Python file

multiModelDebate.enableMattermostFallbac.description: Enable Mattermost fallback when MCP server is unavailable

multiModelDebate.contextGatheringEnabled.description: Enable rich context gathering (file content, errors, debugging state)

multiModelDebate.maxContextSize.description: Maximum characters to include in code context

multiModelDebate.enableCommandLineAccess.description: Allow AI personas to suggest and execute command line operations

multiModelDebate.responseChunkSize.description: Size of chunks when streaming AI responses (larger = bigger chunks, fewer messages)

multiModelDebate.responseStreamDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds between streaming chunks (lower = faster)

multiModelDebate.useResponseChunking.description: Enable response chunking for better display. Disable to send entire response at once
